title: Reservable Yoga Studio with Fitness on Demand, 24hr Fitness Center
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 831 Sq.
Located at Fairview and Eastlake, Equinox, just like its name suggests offers the perfect balance of relaxation while still being close to the action.
Being located just minutes from South Lake Union, Downtown, and the University of Washington makes this community the perfect retreat from the city’s hustle and bustle.
Lake Union is also just steps away.
Pack a picnic lunch and head over to Gas Works Park for a fun outing, or reserve our free Paddleboard amenity for a day of fun out on the lake.
Our 24-hour fitness center offers on-demand workouts, spin classes on our Peloton bikes, and tons of free weight and resistance equipment.
Walk to a myriad of different shops and restaurants all located in your new quaint Eastlake neighborhood.
A home at Equinox is the perfect addition to your balanced lifestyle.
- Advanced-technology Frigidaire front loading washer and dryer*
- Viking or Frigidaire gas range and micro-hood
- Chic cubbies to display your cookbooks or serving ware
- Stylish ceramic tile surrounds in baths
- Custom cabinetry in two different finishes
- Polished slab granite kitchen and bathroom countertops
- Top-of-the-line Viking, Jenn Aire or Fisher & Paykel stainless steel refrigerators*
- Parking Garage with Full Size Spaces
- Reservable Yoga Studio with Fitness on Demand
We are located at 1524 Eastlake Ave E, Seattle, WA, 98102.
Equinox is conveniently located just minutes from downtown Seattle and located just a short distance to the I-5 ramp.
Take EXIT 167 on the LEFT toward AQUARIUM/SEATTLE CENTER.
AVE N. Turn LEFT onto EASTLAKE
Take the BOYLSTON AVE exit, EXIT 168A, toward ROANOKE ST.
Stay STRAIGHT to go onto BOYLSTON
Ask about our accepted breeds and weight limits.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
